page.title: 10MATTHEW'S DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: I am{10 years old.}On Monday I get up at{7 a.m.}and get dressed for{school} in my{uniform:}a brown jumper, white shirt , black trousers and brown shoes. I go downstairs for{breakfast,} and I have bread and strawberry jam. At{8.30 a.m.}I leave for{school}which starts at{8.55 a.m.}Lesson 2 is maths followed by playtime. After music it is R.E. At{12.20 p.m.}is{dinner.}At{ {1p.m.}there is school{orchestra} {practice.} School restarts at{1.30 p.m.}We have a games lesson with Mr. Ottway and Mrs. Norman. At{3.35 p.m.}I go home to play with my friends. At{5-6pm}I have my{main meal:}Spaghetti Bolognese. At{7 p.m.}I practise my{trumpet.}At{ {9 p.m.}I go to{bed}and{read}'101 Dalmations' or 'Starlight Barking'. Lights off is at{9.30 p.m.
